description: The ‘Ain Braq aqueduct, which runs through the Jabal al-Madhbah massif into Petra, was even more sophisticated than scientists previously believed.

title: What lies behind Spain’s curious and ancient tradition of holding a funeral for a SARDINE during Carnaval?
description: In what is surely one of Spain’s most bizarre traditions, people will gather across Spain this week to attend a solemn burial of a symbolic fish.

title: Fast-moving ancient crocodile that RAN across the UK eating victims 215 million years ago is discovered
description: A BIZARRE ancient crocodile that zipped across land 215million years ago to grab victims for dinner has been uncovered in a surprising place. The slender and fast-moving predator would have roamed among dinosaurs on lands that are now the south of the UK. It's a new type of crocodylomorph species that's been named Galahadosuchus jonesi....
